column4: HI, I want to show a popup window with a message in ubuntu 10.14 after the user logs in in gnome. How can I do that?
yes, but tehre is not an easy way sop I dont' have to program?
10.14 ehh (what was the code name of that?), I guess you mean 10.04LTS.  But I don't have an answer so I'll shutup ;)  Good luck.
